title: Harnessing acetogenic bacteria for one-carbon valorization toward sustainable chemical production
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00099D, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jiyun Bae, Chanho Park, Hyunwoo Jung, Sangrak Jin, Byung-Kwan Cho
This review discusses the potential of harnessing acetogenic bacteria for one-carbon valorization as a sustainable chemical production platform, comprehensively covering current challenges, recent progress, and emerging trends in this field.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
